title: What is the interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream and what does it indicate?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing tomatoes or tomatoes in a dream? Tomatoes are considered one of the important vegetables that are included in many cooked foods and have many benefits for the body. Seeing tomatoes means hearing good news and positive changes for the pioneer, and rotten tomatoes mean fatigue and suffering. Updated pubg Interpretation of seeing cooked tomatoes in a dream for a woman Single women: Seeing tomatoes for single women indicates positive changes in their lives. Cooked tomatoes in a dream indicate good luck, getting rid of crises, and overcoming difficult stages in their lives. New Year’s Wishes: Interpretation of tomato paste in a dream for single women. Seeing tomato paste or tomato paste indicates good luck and hearing good news. Interpretation of a dream about red sauce for unmarried women. Buying sauce and tomatoes in a dream indicates the approaching engagement or marriage of her. Tomato sauce indicates the strong feelings of the pioneer. SSC channel frequency. Interpretation of a dream about tomato juice in a dream for a single woman. Seeing tomato juice in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that he has entered into a new love story. It culminated in marriage. It also indicates that she will feel comfortable and happy and her problems will end soon. Interpretation of a dream about pulsing tomatoes in a blender. Seeing tomatoes pulsing in the blender indicates a new life for the beholder. It also indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life. It also indicates good news for the pioneer. The mobile phone in Interpretation of a dream about cutting tomatoes for a single woman. When an unmarried girl sees that she is buying tomatoes in large quantities, this is a sign of abundant livelihood and happy news. But if a girl sees that she is cutting tomatoes in her dream, this indicates exhaustion, suffering, and many problems. Interpretation of a dream about bad or rotten tomatoes. For a single woman: Seeing rotten tomatoes in a dream indicates problems and troubles that the dreamer faces. The dream also indicates bad relationships and emotional problems. Interpretation of a dream about throwing tomatoes: Tomatoes: The red color in a dream is good news for the dreamer about improving all his affairs, achieving good deeds, and fulfilling all his desires. Hitting a person with a tomato in a dream It is a bad dream, because it indicates enmity and enmity between the dreamer and the one who hits him, and it also indicates problems and disagreements. Throwing tomatoes can indicate fatigue, suffering, and lack of financial resources. Getting rid of rotten tomatoes means getting rid of worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing a red tomato for a divorced womanTomatoes in a dream , divorced means that there is someone in your life who wants to marry you. Seeing a good and edible tomato in a dream indicates that there is a wide and very good food for the pioneer. If you see a tomato plant in a dream, it means that you will get a lot of money. Rotten tomatoes in a dream Seeing rotten tomatoes in a young man’s dream Unmarried is evidence of marriage to a disreputable girl and fatigue and suffering in his life. Dreaming of eating rotten tomatoes indicates trouble and exposure to sickness and disease. Taking tomatoes from the dead in a dream Seeing tomatoes emerging from the dead indicates financial crises. Black tomatoes

title: Interpretation of a dream about diamonds and seeing a diamond ring in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about diamonds in a dream through a website about dreams, and see the opinion of Ibn Sirin and dream interpreters about seeing a diamond in a dream and seeing a diamond ring in a dream for unmarried, married and pregnant women. Women. Interpretation of a dream about diamonds Diamonds are among the precious stones, and they are the most expensive and most beautiful aesthetically, and they can be interpreted in visions as appearing to the world. We will provide you as much as possible with all the interpretations reported by dream interpreters. See also: Seeing gold in a dream Interpretation of a dream about giving a ring to someone Diamonds in a dream Seeing the purchase of diamonds in a dream means that the dreamer is pursuing his goal and achieving it. Buying a diamond may indicate a compliment from a person in authority and may indicate the fortuneteller's arrival to a high position. The interpretation of dreams about diamonds shows the dreamer's love and attachment to the world and his abandonment of the afterlife. And whoever thinks that he is selling diamonds, his dream shows the deception of people, and perhaps shows the pursuit of money. The interpretation of a dream about selling diamonds to a married woman may indicate lies and deception. And extracting diamonds from the ground in a dream indicates kindness, success and increased profits. Whoever finds a diamond gets an inheritance or a promotion at work. Seeing the loss of a diamond and searching for it indicates exposure to financial problems and crises. Diamond ring in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a diamond ring in a dream indicates that the dreamer will acquire something valuable, such as a promotion, engagement or marriage to someone What. The interpretation of a dream about a diamond ring in a dream can indicate that the dreamer will gain worldly pleasures. Seeing a diamond ring in a dream given by someone to the dreamer means inviting him to an occasion that he must. The diamond ring in a dream also indicates the fulfillment of desires. Diamonds in a single woman's dream Seeing diamonds for a single woman indicates kindness, stability and happiness in her life. The interpretation of a dream about a diamond ring for an unmarried woman may indicate her marriage in the following period to a man in position. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a diamond ring for an unmarried woman, perhaps a sign of honor and wealth for her. A diamond ring in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates happiness for her and the fulfillment of dreams. The interpretation of a dream wearing a diamond ring for a single woman may indicate that she will get a job or a promotion. Interpretation of a dream about diamonds for a married woman Seeing diamonds in a dream for a married woman indicates kindness, the end of worries and the end of sorrows. Seeing diamonds also indicates an increase in the livelihood of a married woman and her husband. A husband's gift of diamonds to his wife may indicate pregnancy and childbirth for the wife. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a diamond ring for a married woman is a sign of her prestige Or its glory. Diamonds in a dream for a pregnant woman Interpretation of a dream about diamonds for a pregnant woman can indicate vanity in the world, and seeing diamonds for a pregnant woman can indicate the safety of her fetus. Diamonds in a divorced woman’s dream indicate happiness for her, and perhaps a sign of the end of her worries and sorrows. title: What is the interpretation of a dream that my sister is pregnant and married to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married. It is one of the things that most women want to happen in their lives so that every girl can start and settle down a family. It is a gift from God Almighty and one of the blessings that God has bestowed upon us in this world. One of the dreams that most people see in their dreams symbolizes the dreamer and the rest of the evil that can befall people, but visions differ from one case to another and we will clarify the interpretations. Follow this article with us. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married, and this is a sign that she will earn a lot of money from a member of her family and her professional status will rise. If the dreamer sees that her married sister is pregnant and old in a dream, this indicates how much her sister loves life and is busy. With worldly pleasures and avoiding acts of obedience, she seeks forgiveness for them and returns to God Almighty. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a woman seeing her sister pregnant in a dream and married in reality. This indicates that God Almighty will bless her in all aspects of her life and her situation will change for the better. I dreamed that my sister is pregnant and married and this is evidence that the dreamer will gain a lot of capital and increase her financial position. Seeing the dreamer carrying his sister in a dream while she is married, this may be A sign that he will find a new job with a high salary, and his parents may leave him a large inheritance, with which he can increase his financial and social resources. Status: If the dreamer sees his married sister pregnant in his dream, this indicates that God Almighty will grant him a strong body free of diseases. I dreamed that my sister is pregnant while she is unmarried. If the dreamer sees her unmarried sister pregnant and feels happy and satisfied in the dream, this indicates that she is engaged to a good young man. And she will marry her soon. Seeing the girl carrying her unmarried sister in her last months in the dream is evidence of her sister’s ability to bear many responsibilities and that she will get a lot of money and her life circumstances will change for the better. If the dreamer sees her sister pregnant in a dream and feels joy about it This is one of her good visions, because she will get rid of the worries and sorrow that she suffered from and feel safe. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and she was single. This indicates that her sister will marry a man who has a good reputation in society and she will be able to achieve everything she desires. Seeing a woman pregnant with her unmarried sister showing signs of fatigue from childbirth in a dream, this symbolizes the presence of many bad things in her life and this will make her feel depressed. And sadness. I dreamed that my sister is pregnant with a boy and is married. If the dreamer sees that her sister is pregnant with a boy in a dream and is married in reality, this may indicate that she will receive many blessings and God will bless her life. If a girl sees the birth of her sister, a boy with an attractive angelic face in a dream, then this It means that she will gain many good things in the coming period, or if she sees this child with unknown features, this may symbolize that she will encounter many problems. The dreamer sees that his sister is pregnant with a son and has died.

title: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the fall and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of falling by Ibn Sirin: Many of these people can be exposed to falling, whether from high places or from low places, but the process of falling itself is considered one of the dangerous processes that a person can be exposed to in his life and can lead to many dangerous processes. The damage that a person can suffer, and many of us can see it in a dream, falling from heights, and therefore a person can be disturbed and afraid of the interpretations and connotations of this dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of falling. Falling from a height is one of the things to which a person can be exposed to the most severe risks and serious damage to His health. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of falling: -Ibn Sirin interpreted the person who falls in a dream, indicating the beginning of a new life for him. Likewise, if the dreamer falls in his sleep from a high place, and may sustain injuries, this indicates the many misfortunes that await him. While in the case of If someone sees himself falling from a place that did not harm him, this indicates the problems he faces in his life. Along with seeing a single woman falling from the top to her death, it is a testimony of good things to come. Also, falling from the top and falling into the mosque are signs of guidance for the fortuneteller. He explained Commentators say that falling from a height is a sign of achieving goals and desires. Falling from a height into water is a sign of entering into an emotional relationship. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a haila in detail by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of a dream of a child falling from a high place. Falls, especially in children, remain very frightening, and mothers are worried about them. They are always ready to protect their children from the simplest things, and a child falling from a high place in a dream has many connotations, which are: A mother seeing her child sleeping may indicate the mother’s fear for her child in the future. A child falling from a high place is an indication of the safety involved in the matter. We can also We find the process of falling as a result of the dreamer’s fear of things in his real life. Also, the fall of the little girl and her straying from a high place indicates the girl’s long life and her escape from the evil that almost befalls her. In the event that the child falls from a high place, then gets up and walks, this is a sign of The disappearance of worries. Like a child falling from above, many people alternate between being happy and frightening at the same time. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing seeds in a dream from the most famous scholars. Complete interpretation: A dream about falling from the bed for a married woman in a dream. Many people may see in their dreams that they are falling From different places, then they feel anxious and afraid that something bad or bad will happen to them. A dream about a married woman falling out of bed in a dream may indicate: Seeing a woman falling out of bed may indicate the tribulation that awaits her. Also, falling out of bed and not returning to it is a sign of The husband left. The wife’s fall from her bed portends her children’s failure in the academic field. Commentators attributed her fall to the end of her relationship with a member of her family. In one of the solutions, she found herself falling into the sea, foretelling the crises that the wife will face.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a house renovated in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about restoring an old house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Vision: In a dream he dreamed of renovating the house, which indicates that his marriage will be facilitated, financial matters and a lot of money. Likewise, if a man sees that he is restoring his house, this indicates the confusion of his life to protect his owner and the emergence of disputes between them. Vision. Restoring an old house in a dream means injustice, fatigue, and suffering that the dreamer will experience in his life. The interpretation of seeing a cramped house in the dream indicates comfort after distress, rest after sadness, and the end of worry and fatigue. Interpretation of seeing a house renovated in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is By repairing the house, this indicates her close marriage to someone she loves. Also, seeing the renovation of an old house in a dream means that you will break the spell and enter a new job for that girl. On the contrary, seeing a spacious house in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the death of her sorrows, which It leads to joys and a lot of happiness. If a girl sees in her dream a beautiful and spacious house, then this vision indicates that the girl will move from her father’s house to her husband. Interpretation of a dream about repairing an old house for a married woman: Seeing a married girl in her dream in a renovated house means that her sorrows will go away and her fears will go away soon Likewise, if she dreams of a young man buying a renovated house, then this vision shows love and kindness. However, if a married woman sees in her dream a spacious, beautiful and attractive house, then this vision expresses her pregnancy. Also, seeing the house being renovated in a married girl’s dream indicates abundant sustenance for her husband. And her children. Interpretation of a dream about renovating a house for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman renovating her old house in a dream indicates an easy pregnancy, God willing. Indeed, if a pregnant woman sees that she is building her house, this indicates exhaustion and exhaustion. Also, seeing a house renovated in a dream indicates the death of anxiety and sadness for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about renovating an old house for a man: If a man sees that he is buying a renovated house, this indicates his rise to the top and a promotion in his job. Rather, if a married man sees that he is renovating his old house, then this vision indicates a new baby for him. Seeing the restoration of an old and cramped house shows that he He needs his companions in a time of distress and does not see them. Rather, if a man sees in his dream that he is buying a spacious house, then this vision indicates an imminent marriage. Interpretation of dreams for entering my house without permission. If a person dreams in a dream that his partners come to his house without his knowledge, this indicates problems And anxiety. Entering a house in a dream without asking for permission indicates evil, sorrows, and troubles that will come to the people of the house. The dreamer entering a house other than his own is a sign of positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in Comment below and our team of experts will get back to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing swimming in the sea in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, for single women, married people, pregnant women, and males

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing swimming in the sea in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, for single people, married people, pregnant women, and males. The sea carries a lot of mystery and fear among its waves, especially if it appears in a dream. The dream is often associated with some psychological problems, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing swimming in the sea in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation for single people, married people, pregnant women, and men. Interpretation of the dream of seeing swimming in the sea in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin, according to the dream interpretation scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin. The dream of swimming in the sea symbolizes the dreamer’s success and excellence in his studies or work. To dream that I am swimming skillfully in the sea means that the dreamer will get a lot of nutrition, will achieve his goals, achieve what he wants and will be healed if he is sick. Whoever sees in his dream that he is swimming in the sea with his head down Above the water level, his vision indicates that God Almighty has blessed him with success in his professional, social, and emotional life. If the dreamer’s head is below the surface of the sea in the dream, this vision indicates the dreamer’s failure to overcome difficulties and achieve his goals. Whoever dreams that he is swimming in impure water Insects disperse there. This means that the dreamer will face problems and difficulties in the coming period. An auspicious dream is a dream of swimming in the sea and the dreamer finds a pearl, as this dream indicates that the dreamer will get a lot of money or obtain an important position. When one sees in his dream that he is swimming in sea water In winter, this means that he may suffer from some health problems or face crises in the near future. And if the dreamer swam in sea water in winter and died by drowning in a dream, then this vision in him is a sign that the dreamer is facing a crisis in his life. Floating in sea water on his back In a dream, it indicates the dreamer’s repentance to God Almighty and his absolution from disobedience and disobedience. A dream of floating in sea water with a feeling of fear indicates the dreamer’s fear of a problem or a person in reality. Whoever sees in his dream that he is floating in the current, his vision shows that there are many Conflicting opinions, which represent pressure on him, as it shows that the dreamer is stubborn and sticks to his opinion. A dream about a rich person who cannot swim in the sea indicates that someone is planning to seize his wealth or property. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea in a dream for a single woman if she sees an unmarried girl in Her dream is that she is swimming in a calm sea. Her vision indicated that she does not feel fear or anxiety in her life and that her psychological state is largely stable. If the sea in which the lonely girl is swimming in the dream is clear. This vision has evidence that someone wants to marry her and will not cause her problems. However, if the sea in which one girl swims in a dream is unclean and surrounded by insects and she swims with difficulty, this means that she will enter into a relationship with a person with bad morals who will harm her. You must be careful. When a single girl sees herself swimming in the sea with someone she loves. This means that he will be officially linked to her soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing swimming in the sea in a dream for a married woman: Swimming

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing wings in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing feathers in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. There are many types of feathers, but all types have the same composition, and feathers in a dream distinguish them from other creatures. Birds use feathers to fly and help maintain body temperature. Seeing feathers in a dream represents wealth and prosperity, and therefore we will list the most important interpretation of dreams, which is seeing feathers in a dream. Follow us. Dream of seeing wings by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that it is common to see feathers in dreams, indicating that they represent many things that indicate luck, money, and influence. Seeing feathers in a dream could be a new outfit, it could be professional development, it could be the ability to earn a living and money. Seeing feathers falling around him indicates that the dreamer’s life is very comfortable and peaceful and there are no burdens or problems. Seeing wings in The dream is evidence of a person's success and also indicates that he will become an important figure among people. Seeing wings in dreams is a sign of good emotional relationships or a good financial situation. Seeing wings in a girl's dream is evidence of the happiness and prosperity of the girl's real life. Seeing Bai Yu in a dream The girl is evidence that she will get married in the next few days because it shows that her husband will respect her and treat her with kindness. Explain that the dream of seeing black feathers in a dream about a girl is evidence of the girl’s emotional relationship, which will cause her pain and sadness. Dreaming of seeing feathers for a married woman. Seeing wings in a married woman’s dream Evidence of her life with her husband in love, happiness, security, and family stability. Seeing wings in a married woman’s dream can prove that God will give her a new and beautiful life in the future. Seeing feathers in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the righteousness of her, her family, her source of livelihood, her money, and her wealth. She dreams of seeing feathers in a married woman’s dream. Feathers for a pregnant woman: Seeing wings in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of her husband’s love for her. It indicates the date of her upcoming birth. Interpretation of dreams for a pregnant woman who sees black feathers proves that she will give birth to a child with poor health. Seeing colored feathers in a pregnant woman’s dream may prove that she will give birth to a male of high status. In society. Dreaming of seeing bird feathers. Seeing eagles’ wings indicates that the dreamer has fulfilled his ambitions and achieved the goals he has already sought. Seeing duck and goose feathers in a dream means wealth in shopping and sales and an increase in the economy. If you see chicken wings in your dreams, this indicates that you are facing a problem. Small ones will cause you some inconvenience. Seeing ostrich hair in a dream proves that the dreamer is a sociable person who is loved by people in life. Dreaming of seeing colored feathers Seeing black feathers in a dream means that the dreamer will enter into a new romantic relationship that at first glance seems like a beautiful relationship, but it will fail. Ultimately, it leads to severe pain and sadness. Seeing wings in a dream indicates that stability and happiness prevail in one’s life, whether at work, family, or friends, because it indicates happiness, joy, progress, and

title: Interpretation of a dream about catching the devil in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of being captured by the devil in a dream. We can find that the interpretation of the dream of being captured by the devil in a dream. There are a large number of evidence and interpretations of dreams, and we find that scholars in general and those who are diligent are looking for interpretations, and those responsible for the site do not interfere in the interpretations, rather they are sent for the scholars’ interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of being captured Satan in a dream: It is possible that seeing the devil captured indicates misfortune that the dreamer may be exposed to during this period. In the event that one sees that he has captured the devil, this may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer faced in his life during this time. It may Seeing Satan in a dream indicates the dreamer’s sins and misdeeds, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. If one sees that he has captured Satan, this may indicate that he is far from God, and has indulged in his desires, and he must return to God Almighty. Interpretation Dreaming of catching the head of a snake in a dream Catching the head of a snake in a dream can indicate the dreamer’s ability to achieve success and ambitions. Dreaming of catching the head of a snake in a dream may indicate a material loss that the dreamer will overcome with God’s grace. If someone sees that he caught the head of a snake, this may indicate Victory over an enemy who was close to him. If a person sees the head of a snake and catches it, this may indicate rejection of the great abuse that surrounded the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a policeman in a dream: Seeing a person being arrested by a policeman may indicate some Disagreements and family problems that he faces during this time. In the event that he is arrested by a policeman, this may indicate some financial crises that the dreamer suffers during those days. In the event that a person believes that he has been arrested by a policeman, it may indicate This indicates some of the obstacles that the dreamer faces in his scientific and professional life. It is possible to see a policeman arresting a person in a dream, which indicates some of the fear that the dreamer felt during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of someone grabbing me from my back in a dream. Anyone can see in Dreaming that someone grabbed me from behind indicates his diligence and struggle in life. A dream of grabbing someone from behind in a dream may indicate the peace and calm that the dreamer felt at that time. In the event that someone sees that someone has grabbed him from his back This may indicate his desire to get rid of problems and fears from his life at that time. Seeing the person who grabbed him from behind could mean that he is free from life’s problems and the beginning of a new page, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in a dream: If one sees that he is carrying the Qur’an, then he may This indicates the blessing and nourishment he obtains during this period. Seeing someone holding the Qur’an may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. Seeing yourself holding the Qur’an in a dream may indicate the tremendous livelihood that the dreamer will gain during this period. If If one sees himself holding the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate positive changes

title: Interpretation of forgiveness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream. Asking for forgiveness in a dream is one of the common things that many people see in their dreams, as this dream shows many interpretations of the life of the fortuneteller, and through our article we will learn about it. Interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream. What is the interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream? See Ibn Shirin in Interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream, dreams that are given to a strong person, from dreams that portend goodness, according to the verse of Surah Nuh, I said: Ask forgiveness from your Lord, whoever forgives, He sends the sky above you abundantly, and upon you wealth and children, and He makes gardens for you and makes rivers for you. Therefore, asking for forgiveness in a dream is a sign of the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer will receive, whether it is money or children. The vision of forgiveness according to Ibn Sirin is not limited to this world only, but it clearly indicates the high status that the dreamer will achieve in God Almighty. , because it is a sign of contentment. Asking for forgiveness without praying in a dream indicates that Almighty God will prolong the life of the dreamer, and it may be a sign of the victory that the dreamer will achieve in matters that concern the dreamer. Ibn Sirin believes that if a woman finds herself and someone forces her to ask for forgiveness in a dream, then This vision means warning her against adultery and about the sins she commits in reality and repenting to God Almighty. Seeing forgiveness in prayer in a dream indicates good news that prayer will be answered, God willing. Interpretation of forgiveness for a single person Seeing forgiveness in anyone’s dream is good for the great good that she will obtain. In the near future, this dream indicates that the girl will enjoy an excellent position and will fulfill all the desires that she wanted in life. An unmarried girl who asks for forgiveness indicates her closeness to God Almighty and her distance from sins and disobedience, and sometimes this dream is a sign that she will face a lot of... Difficulties, but, thanks to God, she will be able to quickly overcome them. Interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is asking for forgiveness, then her dream is a sign of the good and great happiness that she will have in the near future, and in all cases it will be good news that she wants. . In life, whether it is good offspring or a lot of money. Seeing a married woman asking for forgiveness is a good vision and a sign of the arrival of happiness and stability in her life. Interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman. A dream about asking for forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates happiness to see her new child soon, and this dream heralds By the end of the pain and problems that she felt during pregnancy. Seeing forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the fulfillment of desires that she has always dreamed of and desired, and the fulfillment of which was a little delayed. If a pregnant woman sees that she is asking for forgiveness in a dream, this is a sign of the approaching birth. Interpretation of seeking forgiveness In a dream for a man: If a person sees in his dream that he is asking for forgiveness, then his vision means faith in God, piety, and piety that fill his heart. Asking forgiveness for a man in a dream indicates the removal of worries and problems that have arisen.
